channel.title: Please help delta and pi compiler error!
channel.description:
[u][b]I DO HAVE JAVA 6 U24 IDK ABOUT JDK BUT I WENT TO JAVA.COM AND DOWNLOADED AND I SEARCHED FOR A JDK DOWNLOAD AND I THOUGHT I GOT ON BUT IDK IF IT WORKED.[/b][/u] And yes On the PI source i changed the thing to my java version and on delta it didnt give me an option.
When trying to compile my delta source i get:
You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2zoyvf8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2wmjbwl.jpg[/img]
When trying to compile PI source i get:
The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
PLEASE HELP!!!!!

item.title: Please help delta and pi compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins

@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“hdmodzz, post:19, topic:385148”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=480909.msg3521496#msg3521496 date=1299437272]
https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u16-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer
[/quote]

OMG!!! TYSM!!! (; you were very helpfull all the way through you should deffinetly be forum admin. TY!! (;[/quote]
Lol, glad to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help delta and pi compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

In the C: drive, look for a folder with a name like glassfish3 or glassbowl3, then open it, look for a folder called “Jdk” then “bin” then your javac and other files may be there.

item.title: Please help delta and pi compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @hdmodzz hdmodzz
item.description:
@hdmodzz wrote:

Mendorphins:

You have to declare your JDK version not your Java version. Go on to my signature and download the tools package. There’s a JavaFixer in there that tells you what versions you have and if they are installed or not.

Ok, ill try that im downloading atm ill update you when its downloaded if it works

Read full topic

item.title: Please help delta and pi compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @hdmodzz hdmodzz
item.description:
@hdmodzz wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Are you using 64 Bit or Windows 7? If so the path is set to “C:/Programs and Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_24/.bin*” So maybe you are only installing the java to 64 bit and its reading for 32 bit.

No windows vista 32 bit.

Read full topic
